data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Sentry Gun Pack
data.detailed_description:
Arm your squad with new equipment and bring them even more glorious victories in the battles to come!



This pack includes:

  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Heavy Bolters, perfect in eliminating lightly armoured enemies with deadly efficiency.
  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Lascannons, capable of halting an enemy assault at the longest distances.
  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Multi-Meltas, able to incinerate any enemy and turn their armour into piles of molten metal.
  • A new Chain Effect, allowing you to destroy enemy equipment.
  • Two Combat Shields providing your hero with extra protection until the battle ends.
  • Three legendary melee weapons, each with unique combat properties.
data.about_the_game:
Arm your squad with new equipment and bring them even more glorious victories in the battles to come!



This pack includes:

  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Heavy Bolters, perfect in eliminating lightly armoured enemies with deadly efficiency.
  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Lascannons, capable of halting an enemy assault at the longest distances.
  • Tarantula Sentry Guns with Multi-Meltas, able to incinerate any enemy and turn their armour into piles of molten metal.
  • A new Chain Effect, allowing you to destroy enemy equipment.
  • Two Combat Shields providing your hero with extra protection until the battle ends.

data.short_description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf is a card-driven turn-based tactical game which features RPG elements, containing a single player campaign, survival and PvP modes. Win these battles using the arsenal of weapons, abilities and cunning of the sky warriors.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Hardware Accelerated Graphics
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
  • Дополнительно: DirectX 11 compatible GPU is required to play the game! Attempts on launching the game on systems which do not meet minimum requirements will cause crashes! Integrated GPUs may cause significant FPS drops! The game is not fully compatible with legacy AMD Radeon HD Video Cards which don't support DirectX 12!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7
  • Процессор: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: 1 GB Video Card
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 5 GB
  • Дополнительно: DirectX 11 compatible GPU is required to play the game! Attempts on launching the game on systems which do not meet minimum requirements will cause crashes! Integrated GPUs may cause significant FPS drops! The game is not fully compatible with legacy AMD Radeon HD Video Cards which don't support DirectX 12!
